review_blob: Lives up to the deScription. Nice head and feel on the pallet. Wild yeast component is nitric lie in the smell. Great crisp finish.

Excellent nano brewed IPA. Love these guys. Very hoppy with a nice passion fruit finish. This beer turned me on to the whole beerd operation. We drink 5 growlers a week between 3 people. Our first choice when we go to the fridge.
